Class Comment

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Notification
      • model.Comment

  • public class Comment
extends Notification
    Author:
    Nishant Sinha

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Comment(int commentID, int commenterID, int productID, java.lang.String message, java.sql.Timestamp commentTime, int replyTo)
      Overloaded constructor with commentTime and Comment replyTo for database retrievals.
      Comment(int commenterID, int productID, java.lang.String message)
      Called from the front-end when a user comments on a product.
      Comment(int commenterID, int productID, java.lang.String message, int replyTo)
      Called from the frontend when a user replies to a comment.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Comment

        public Comment(int commentID,
               int commenterID,
               int productID,
               java.lang.String message,
               java.sql.Timestamp commentTime,
               int replyTo)
        Overloaded constructor with commentTime and Comment replyTo for database retrievals.
        Parameters:
        commentID - The primary key ID of this comment.
        commenterID - The primary key ID of the user who made this comment.
        productID - The primary key ID of the product this comment is relevant to.
        message - The String message the user wrote. For example, "What's the size?"
        commentTime - The time this comment was created.
        replyTo - The primary key ID of the comment the user replied to, 0 if this comment at the root level.

      • Comment

        public Comment(int commenterID,
               int productID,
               java.lang.String message)
        Called from the front-end when a user comments on a product.
        Parameters:
        commenterID - The primary key ID of the user who made this comment.
        productID - The primary key ID of the product this comment is relevant to.
        message - The String message the user wrote. For example, "What's the size?"

      • Comment

        public Comment(int commenterID,
               int productID,
               java.lang.String message,
               int replyTo)
        Called from the frontend when a user replies to a comment.
        Parameters:
        commenterID - The primary key ID of the user who made this comment.
        productID - The primary key ID of the product this comment is relevant to.
        message - The String message the user wrote. For example, "What's the size?"
        replyTo - The primary key ID of the comment the user replied to, 0 if this comment at the root level.

    • Method Detail

      • getMessage

        public java.lang.String getMessage()
        Returns:
        String attribute of comment. For example, "What's the size?"

      • isReplyTo

        public int isReplyTo()
        Returns:
        The primary key ID of the comment that this comment replied to.
        For example, Seller replied "10" to the comment "What's the size?". This comment would be "10". The comment containing "What's the size" would be returned.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Notification
